name: 4 Seasons Journey
description:
4 Seasons Journey was made is less than 3 days for the MiniJam#49 game jam.  

Theme: Seasons, Limitation: All Sprites must fit in 4x4 space.

All assets, music, sounds, and code were made during the jam period (the only exceptions were helper scripts and the font used).

4 Seasons Journey is a mini game about traveling the kingdom during the 4 seasons, spring, summer, fall, and winter. The goal of the game is to make it to the King's castle and dethrone the evil wizard that has taken over. 

An evil wizard has Killed the king and taken the throne! Enslaving knights and turning them against the kingdom, he is wreaking havoc across the land. Armed with nothing more than your trusty sword and marksman rifle, you prepare to undergo a year-long journey to the King's castle in order to slay the wizard.  Good luck adventurer!

  • Move: W A S D
  • Attack: Left MB
  • Equip Gun: 1
  • Equip Sword: 2

      

If you enjoyed my game and would like to support me, feel free to follow me on social media or leave a donation on one of my games :)
